org.apache.distributedlog.logsegment

Interface LogSegmentEntryStore


  • @Beta
public interface LogSegmentEntryStore
    Log Segment Store to read log segments

    • Method Summary

      Delete the actual log segment from the entry store.

      Create a new log segment allocator for allocating log segment entry writers.

      • openReader

                                                          long startEntryId)
        Open the reader for reading data to the log segment.
        Parameters:
        segment - the log segment to read data from
        startEntryId - the start entry id
        Returns:
        future represent the opened reader

      • openRandomAccessReader

                                                                                  boolean fence)
        Open the reader for reading entries from a random access log segment.
        Parameters:
        segment - the log segment to read entries from
        fence - the flag to fence log segment
        Returns:
        future represent the opened random access reader
